original_title: Surado Campus CEO honoured at BWIO-USA Awards 2023
original_body_lines: P.S.R.Buddhika, Chairman/Chief Executive Officer of Surado Campus of Business Management, was recently bestowed with the prestigious ‘Best CEO of the Year’ Award at the BWIO-USA Awards 2023. The award was presented to P.S.R.Buddhika by Business World International Organization, USA (BWIO) at a gala awards ceremony at Taj Samudra, Colombo.

BWIO-USA Awards is a distinctive recognition for a company recognized as a leader in its industry category based on current year marketing standing. It identifies and recognizes the achievements made by organizations that have demonstrated exceptional business performance without undermining their integrity and help in shaping society at large.

The awards have been conceptualized to include organizations from diversified business segments that have played a significant role in the growth and success of the world economy. Each company under its particular industry is thoroughly evaluated by the BWIO-USA team and the jury panel in an unbiased selection process, due to which the credibility of these awards has always been admired worldwide.

Commenting on his recent achievement, P.S.R.Buddhika said, “I am delighted to be honoured with this prestigious accolade. This award would not be possible without my amazing team, whose commitment to and passion for catering to the growing demand for professional caregiving in Sri Lanka’s healthcare industry. It is further testament to Surado’s commitment to crafting a novel and high-quality offerings to Sri Lankans, delivering our promise to commit to excellence in the local higher education sector, especially Sri Lanka’s professional caregiving sector.”
